title: Spirits from the past
creator_credit: British Broadcasting Corporation and Hugh Burnett
brief_description: Looks at the claims that famous men and women from the past are still working creatively with people alive today. Three people speak about their experiences and beliefs, and claim to be in touch with dead musicians; receiving new music from many composers such as Liszt, Chopin, Beethoven, Brahms and Stravinsky.
